title: Quality Checks & Final Inspection
description: Perform comprehensive quality checks and final inspection before cart delivery.

steps.title: Final Systems Check
steps.instructions: Verify all electrical connections, test motor operation, check steering, brakes, and lights. Complete checklist.

safetyWarnings.text: Never skip quality checks. Customer safety depends on thoroughness.

knowledgeChecks.question: Why is final quality inspection critical?
knowledgeChecks.explanation: Final inspection ensures every cart meets safety and quality standards.
